climj.description: A simple application to consult the weather forecast in real time

graphicator.description: A drawing application that implements various algorithms like DDA, Bresenham, and Bezier curves for drawing geometric shapes

imageviewer.description: An image processing application that allows users to apply various filters and transformations to images, as well as generate histograms

chatagent.description: An intelligent chatbot agent with AI integration developed for a hackathon competition. Features voice recognition, sentiment analysis, and real-time responses using Gemini AI
